014package org.microbean.construct.type;
015
016import java.lang.annotation.Annotation;
017
018import java.util.List;
019
020import javax.lang.model.element.AnnotationMirror;
021
022import javax.lang.model.type.NoType;
023import javax.lang.model.type.TypeKind;
024import javax.lang.model.type.TypeVisitor;
025
026/**
027 * A useful implementation of {@link NoType} with a {@link TypeKind} of {@link TypeKind#NONE NONE}.
028 *
029 * @author <a href="https://about.me/lairdnelson" target="_top">Laird Nelson</a>
030 */
031public final class NoneType implements NoType {
032
033  private static final NoneType INSTANCE = new NoneType();
034  
035  private static final Annotation[] EMPTY_ANNOTATION_ARRAY = new Annotation[0];
036
037  private NoneType() {
038    super();
039  }
040
041  @Override // TypeMirror
042  public final <R, P> R accept(final TypeVisitor<R, P> v, final P p) {
043    return v.visitNoType(this, p);
044  }
045  
046  @Override // NoType (AnnotatedConstruct)
047  public final <A extends Annotation> A getAnnotation(final Class<A> annotationType) {
048    return null;
049  }
050
051  @Override // NoType (AnnotatedConstruct)
052  public final List<? extends AnnotationMirror> getAnnotationMirrors() {
053    return List.of();
054  }
055
056  @Override // NoType (AnnotatedConstruct)
057  @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
058  public final <A extends Annotation> A[] getAnnotationsByType(final Class<A> annotationType) {
059    return (A[])EMPTY_ANNOTATION_ARRAY;
060  }
061  
062  @Override // NoType (TypeMirror)
063  public final TypeKind getKind() {
064    return TypeKind.NONE;
065  }
066
067  /**
068   * Returns a {@link NoneType}.
069   *
070   * @return a non-{@code null} {@link NoneType}
071   *
072   * @see NoType
073   *
074   * @see TypeKind#NONE
075   */
076  public static final NoneType of() {
077    return INSTANCE;
078  }
079  
080}
